channel.title: Cheers from Krakow
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm a programmer turned bootstrapper, working on my SaaS. Glad to meet you all!
Anyone from Krakow? I'd love to meet.

item.title: Cheers from Krakow
item.dc:creator: Michal_Mazurek
item.description:
Nice to meet you Steve,

I’m working on a social monitoring tool for tech startups. The tool helps growth hackers and technical founders hustle on sites like Twitter, Reddit, Indie Hackers or Hacker News. Having found my ideal audience I’m now working on marketing. It’s tough but satisfying!

Read full topic

item.title: Cheers from Krakow

item.description:
Welcome Michal,

Care to tell us a little about your SaaS?

Read full topic
